pullRequest.title: Add option to display the search sidebar inline
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds an option (layer icon next to the search title) to display the sidebar inline next to the search results:

To unify both sidebar versions (inline and overlay) we had to adjust the sidebar layout. This PR also adds more content for the sidebar sections, to make use of the available space.
Types of changes

 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

nodes.bodyText: IMO this is too light for anyone who is even slightly reading impaired. We should not use more than 50 for text, in this case 40 is even better.
The icon is not ideal, it does not really give away what it does. IMO the pin icon was better.
We should use isNew from ViewStore instead.

Ad Hoc Search is not a common way to describe that the search is new/untitled. I would prefer something more common. like New Search or Untitled Search. (I do remember why we changed from the first to the second option, but I am not convinced that someone could still mistake the heading for an action, the way it looks now)
